trans-unit.source: Contains properties that you can use to query system settings.
trans-unit.target: 包含您可以用於查詢系統設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border multiplier factor that determines the width of a window's sizing border.
trans-unit.target: 取得框線乘數因數，這個因數會決定視窗縮放邊框的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.Border" /> property.
Gets the metric that determines the border width of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊，該度量資訊會決定非最小化視窗之非工作區的框線寬度。

trans-unit.source: The metric is obtained from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.BorderWidth" /> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption height for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊，該度量資訊會決定非最小化視窗之非工作區的標題高度。
取得從 SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS 的度量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.CaptionHeight" /> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption width for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊，該度量資訊會決定非最小化視窗之非工作區的標題寬度。
取得從 SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS 的度量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.CaretWidth" /> property.
Gets a value indicating whether the client area animation feature is enabled.

trans-unit.target: 布林值。**true**如果已啟用工作區動畫， **false**否則。

如果已啟用則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。
